name: iapetus
description:
iapetus is a short meditative experience loosely about communicating with monolithic beings on an alien planet. You can walk around and interact with the monoliths to change their shape and colours. There are no explicit win/fails states and you are encouraged to relax and enjoy the process of finding/creating a scene that they like.

Instructions:
W - Forwards
A - Left
S - Backwards
D - Right

Mouse - Look around
Left Mouse Button - Change monolith colour.
Right Mouse Button - Change monolith brightness.
